lab-1-step-3-ig1.alt: Installing a VSIX in VS Code.

lab-1-step-4-ig1.prompt: A screenshot showing a new 'portfolio-website' folder inside the 'Projects' directory.

lab-1-step-5-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of VS Code's 'Open Folder...' dialog selecting the 'portfolio-website' folder.
lab-1-step-5-ig1.alt: Opening the project folder in VS Code.

lab-1-step-6-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the DCE Onboarding view with the 'Project Scope' text area filled out.

lab-1-step-8-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the 'Generate Initial Artifacts Prompt' button being highlighted in the DCE.

lab-1-step-12-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of Google's AI Studio, showing four browser tabs with the correct model settings.

lab-1-step-15-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the 'Parse All' button being highlighted in the PCPP toolbar.

lab-1-step-17-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the 'Select This Response' button being highlighted in the PCPP.

lab-1-step-18-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the 'This workspace is not a git repository' error message in VS Code.
lab-1-step-18-ig1.alt: The Git repository not found error.

lab-1-step-22-ig1.prompt: A screenshot showing the `GitHub-Repository-Setup-Guide.md` file open in the editor.

lab-1-step-27-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the 'Accept Selected' button being clicked in Cycle 2.

lab-1-step-28-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the VS Code terminal showing a successful 'git --version' command.

lab-1-step-31-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the 'Successfully initialized repository' notification in VS Code.

lab-1-step-32-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the PCPP in a new cycle with the title 'Create Project Scaffold.'

lab-1-step-34-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the 'Baseline (Commit)' and 'Accept Selected' buttons being highlighted for the scaffold cycle.
lab-1-step-34-ig1.alt: Baselining and accepting the scaffold code.

lab-1-step-36-ig1.prompt: A screenshot of the portfolio website running for the first time in a browser.

lab-1-step-37-ig1.alt: Continuing to iterate by adding new context.
